title: Art of type and human character
content: do u know where i can find some of those sample..... by using type and form it into a face
author: ngoc723

comments.content:
This popped into mind. A spread from Bradbury Thompson's _Westvaco Inspirations_.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111239im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/9107.jpg)

Joan Mas created a couple of dingbat fonts with faces constructed from typo characters.   
   
 [http://inicia.es/de/jmas/mac\_freeware.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111239/http:/inicia.es/de/jmas/mac_freeware.htm)   
   
The Antypepatics and Lletraparits.
